com.ihordev.holidays.core.util

Class DateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihordev.holidays.core.util.DateUtils

  • public final class DateUtils
extends Object

    A class that provides utilities for date operations. All it's methods are based on anchor date which is 1 january 1900 and fact that this day is monday.

      • countLeapYears

        public static int countLeapYears(int year)
        Counts leap years from start of gregorian calendar (1582 year) to specified year.
        Parameters:
        year - the year for which leap years must be counted
        Returns:
        leap years for specified year
        See Also:
        isLeapYear(int)

      • isLeapYear

        public static boolean isLeapYear(int year)
        Determines if specified year is a leap year. A leap year is a year after 1582 year (gregorian calendar start) with such properties: 
         if (year is not divisible by 4) then (it is a common year)
 else if (year is not divisible by 100) then (it is a leap year)
 else if (year is not divisible by 400) then (it is a common year)
 else (it is a leap year)
        Parameters:
        year - the year to check if it is a leap year
        Returns:
        if specified year is a leap year
